name: Manas Ranjan Sahu
title: Lead Software Engineer
objective: To make high-quality, exciting, applications that people love to use on any device while working with other smart and highly motivated engineers.

projects.name: MARS (Mar 2020 – Present)
projects.technologies: ReactJS, Redux, HTML5, SCSS, Bootstrap JavaScript, Jest, Microsoft Azure
projects.description: A Veterinarian project, where Doctor's commissions can be calculated & maintained. It is a complex app where contract details of doctors and their pay structure maintained as well

projects.name: AEC (Jan 2019 – Feb 2020)
projects.technologies: ReactJS, Redux, HTML5, SCSS, Bootstrap JavaScript, Jasmine
projects.description: Amadeus Event Core (AEC) is an internal R & D project, where whole Event data operations can be operated. It also developed into a plugin that can be implemented by other teams across the Amadeus. It facilitates a search platform by generating dynamic arguments according to user utilization and provides relevant data according to the search. Moreover, it facilitates to manipulate those data as per requirement.

projects.name: UNIPING (July 2017 – Feb 2020)
projects.technologies: Angular 8, HTML5, SCSS, TypeScript, Jasmine, Angular Material, Kendo UI
projects.description: Uniping is an Amadeus web-based application where one can track server by pinger configuration and can be controlled through the web app by the authorize user. One can, However, simply watch pinger status if he has not authorized to configure the pingers. Uniping is an R&D task request initiative program which consolidates pinger data to reduce the mean time to recover in case of incident. Uniping provides help to all support team across the world inside Amadeus, In case of any server failure it immediately raise ticket to respective server owners by virtue of which immediately one can act on same.

projects.name: ARISTA (Dec 2015 – July 2017)
projects.technologies: Angular JS, Angular 2, HTML5, JavaScript, Less, ESlint, JSInspect, Jasmine
projects.description: Cloud Vision Portal (CVP) is web based application where in whole Network operations can be controlled through the web app by the admin. Devices, Switches, Routers are created virtually in the application and Configuration’s, IP’s are manually pushed to the respective switches or devices. This will enhance the usage of virtual devices over the web app to control the entire Network setup.

projects.name: Sales Force (Sep 2013 – Dec 2015)
projects.technologies: HTML5, CSS3, jQuery, Media Query, Angular JS, Bootstrap
projects.description: All the projects are PSD to HTML conversion, where will get the PSD file from the client and we need covert them to HTML version from the scratch. Most of them are email newsletter & Single page Application. Also, we need to check for cross platform/domains rendering issues using litmus application.
